original_title: Sri Lanka President to meet creditors
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka President Ranil Wickremesinghe will meet creditors in Paris to discuss debt during an overseas visit, Cabinet spokesman Bandula Gunawardana said.
Sri Lanka has to complete restructuring of debt to unlock new funds including for building roads, Gunawardana, who is also transport minister said.
Sri Lanka is also expected restructure domestic debt. An overall debt re-structuring strategy has not yet been made public.
Sri Lanka has said government bonds will be re-structured and not bills, except for central bank holdings.
Efforts are also underway to minimise the impact on banks and maintain financial stability, multiple government spokesmen have said. (Colombo/June13/2023)
